titles.en: The Book of Tawheed (Oneness of Allah<sup>azwj</sup>)
Chapter 27 – The Trial and the Testing
Chapter 27 – The Trial and the Testing

text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ بْنِ هَاشِمٍ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ يُونُسَ بْنِ عَبْدِ الرَّحْمَنِ عَنْ حَمْزَةَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ الطَّيَّارِ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ مَا مِنْ قَبْضٍ وَ لَا بَسْطٍ إِلَّا وَ لِلَّهِ فِيهِ مَشِيئَةٌ وَ قَضَاءٌ وَ ابْتِلَاءٌ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim Bin Hashim, from Muhammad Bin Isa, from Yunus Bin Abdul Rahman, from Hamza Bin Muhammad Al Tayyar,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘There is no constriction (of sustenance) nor an extension (of sustenance) except for Allah<sup>azwj</sup> therein is a Desire, and Ordainment, and a Trial’.

text: عِدَّةٌ مِنْ أَصْحَابِنَا عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ خَالِدٍ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنْ فَضَالَةَ بْنِ أَيُّوبَ عَنْ حَمْزَةَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ الطَّيَّارِ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ إِنَّهُ لَيْسَ شَيْ‏ءٌ فِيهِ قَبْضٌ أَوْ بَسْطٌ مِمَّا أَمَرَ اللَّهُ بِهِ أَوْ نَهَى عَنْهُ إِلَّا وَ فِيهِ لِلَّهِ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ ابْتِلَاءٌ وَ قَضَاءٌ .

en.hubeali: A number of our companions, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad Bin Khalid, from his father, from Fazalat Bin Ayoub, from Hamza Bin Muhammad Al Tayyar,

(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> havin said: ‘There is nothing wherein is either a constriction or an extension from what Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Commanded with or Forbade from, except therein, for Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic, is a Trial and an Ordainment’.
